about.name: Tee Wenjie
about.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
about.headline: I build full stack web applications
about.description: Starting my journey in crafting 3D assets for simulators and terrains. After a spark of passion for creating procedural modelling scripts for large-scale terrains, I am driven to bridge the domains of design and code to deliver solutions to transform and innovate lives and industries. My unique blend of technical expertise and artistic creativity leads to solutions that are functional and visually appealing.

experience.name: Software Development Engineer
experience.description: Full-stack Typescript developer for Armed Forces Enterprise Safety Information System (ESIS) integrated with Safe Guardian Mobile Application for the SAF consolidation and analysis of Safety Incidents.
achievements: "Recognition for Excellence" was awarded by the company for proactive leadership in organizing and advancing projects and achieving successful outcomes.
Revamped the development of new ETL workflows, leading to a 50% increase in issue resolution and workflow creation efficiency improved by 25%.
Developed and delivered Email Management features which are used across all branches of the Armed Forces enabling efficient email broadcasting for many modules residing in ESIS

experience.name: Terrain Engineer
achievements: Led a team of three 3D modellers in 2020 to deliver and integrate multiple large-scale 3D terrains
Created procedural modelling scripts to build and automate processes to scale terrain production from 1km sq to 5km sq.
Initiated changes in asset workflow such as an asset management system, which led to an improvement of production time by 1/3.

experience.name: Software Engineering Student
experience.description: Building strong foundational knowledge in full-stack web development using modern stacks and frameworks.
